text: Deidre Ann Hall (born October 31, 1947 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, USA) is an American actress and producer. She has been featured in many television soap opera shows. She played "Dr. Marlena Evans" in Days of Our Lives for more than 30 years. == References == Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Milwaukee Category:1947 births Category:Living people
title: Deidre Hall
